summary:
Become a part of the united worlds of crypto and FinTech - Currently, 489 million (48.9% of the total supply) of PBX tokens are locked in StayKing. Find out why Probinex is the key to your financial independence.

 Our products - Native PBX utility token is the blood and soul of each and every product we make. Find out how to become part of our ecosystem.

 PBX token - The native token of the Probinex project. Pay the exchange fees, earn more in Earnio or allocate. Make the best of Probinex.

 Earnio - Unique platform compliant with regulations, utilizing cryptocurrencies. Deposit in EUR, BTC or ETH and earn more thanks to our trading strategies.

 Probinex Exchange - Ultimate goal of our product fleet. Unique crypto-exchange, ready for the regulated world. Trade any asset, anytime.

 StayKing - StayKing is premium loyalty program for PBX token holders. Lock your tokens in smart contracts and let them do the work for you.

 pbxpay - Unique e-wallet that is open to the world of cryptocurrencies and gives you the freedom to handle your funds as you intend to.
